# Vendor Dependencies

This directory contains third-party source code vendored to ensure hermetic builds.

| Component | Version | License      | Source URL                                |
| :-------- | :------ | :----------- | :---------------------------------------- |
| ls-qpack  | 2.6.2   | MIT          | https://github.com/litespeedtech/ls-qpack |
| xxHash    | 0.8.3   | BSD 2-Clause | https://github.com/Cyan4973/xxHash        |

**License Compliance**:
Full license texts are preserved in the `LICENSE` file within each subdirectory.
